InstructionData.Title: Clock IC
InstructionData.Author: Hagyno
InstructionData.Instructions:
alias Sensor d0 # Day Sensor instaled to 180 alias Display d1 # LED display
alias variable r0 alias hour r1
main: l variable Sensor Horizontal add variable variable 180 div variable variable 15 trunc hour variable mod variable variable 1 mul variable variable 60 trunc variable variable div variable variable 100 add variable variable hour s Display Setting variable yield j main
